name: Mr. Mower (itch)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Accelerate: Enter, W or Up arrow key
  • Break/Reverse: Shift, S or Down arrow key
  • Turn Left: A or Left arrow key
  • Turn Right: D or Right arrow key

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Just mow all the grass lol

Spring is here, time to get mowing again!!!

This is an entry for the Great Spring Game Jam 2022 hosted by Firth Games, but you probably already knew that.

Hope you like it  : )

Also play it on Newgrounds: Mr. Mower (newgrounds.com)

Music by (1) Noah Hughes (@cashwarior1) / Twitter

Everything else by me (1) Vulty is game debelobing (@Vulty_Gamedevs) / Twitter
